title: Rebrand UI text and domain references to Tchat.com

requirements.summary: Rebrand user-facing product name text from “Chat” to “Tchat” in unauthenticated and authenticated UI.
acceptanceCriteria: On the unauthenticated screen, the primary headline uses “Tchat” (not “Chat”) when referring to the app name.
In the authenticated header, the product title uses “Tchat” (not “Chat”).
No new user-facing text is introduced that mentions freechat.com.

file_operations.description: Update product/site branding strings to “Tchat” where they represent the app name (unauthenticated welcome headline and authenticated header title). Also update any related user-facing accessibility text (e.g., logo alt text) to reflect Tchat branding, without introducing any freechat.com mentions.

requirements.summary: Update footer domain label and link target from freechat.com to tchat.com while preserving security attributes.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer shows the exact text “@ 2026 ai licensed tchat.com”, with “tchat.com” as a clickable link.
The footer link navigates to https://tchat.com in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
There are no remaining references to https://freechat.com or the label “freechat.com” in frontend/src/App.tsx.

file_operations.description: Replace the footer link label and href from freechat.com to tchat.com (label exactly “tchat.com”; href exactly https://tchat.com) while preserving target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Ensure the full footer text reads exactly “@ 2026 ai licensed tchat.com” and remove any remaining freechat.com references from this file.

requirements.summary: Update static HTML metadata to reflect Tchat.com branding and remove any freechat.com references.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html does not contain any references to freechat.com.
The HTML <title> is updated to reflect Tchat branding (contains “Tchat” and no longer reads as a generic scaffold title).

file_operations.description: Update the document <title> to a Tchat-branded title (must include “Tchat” and remove the generic scaffold wording). Verify no freechat.com references exist in this static entrypoint.
